extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     (COGS201 or COGS200 or PSYC220) and CISC352, or permission of the School.

basic.description: Systems and techniques for developing computational models of human cognitive processes. Symbolic artificial-intelligence and neural-network approaches. Students will become familiar with the programming language LISP, and use it in implementing some aspects of cognitive models.
basic.subject: COGS
basic.title: Programming Cognitive Models
